name: Interactive Cat Feather Toy, Automatic Fluffy Tail Teaser with Motion Sensor,Whack a mole Cat Toy, USB Rechargeable, Suction Cup for Stable Play, Perfect for Indoor Cats
short_description: Interactive Cat Toy with Prey Simulation: The fluffy tail moves through the holes, mimicking real prey and engaging your cat’s natural hunting instincts. This motion-activated cat toy is perfect for stimulating play and encouraging interactive play. Coming with a replacement fluffy tail teaser.

Motion-Activated Fun for Cats: Featuring a smart motion sensor, the whack a mole toy activates when your cat approaches, offering a hands-free experience.Sensing distance: 4 ft. Note: Not recommended for pets afraid of sudden start-up sounds.

Stable Play with Suction Cup: The toy attaches securely to flat surfaces like windows, doors, or floors with a strong suction cup, ensuring stability during playtime. Great for indoor cats, it stays in place for continuous fun.

USB Rechargeable Design: USB rechargeable, this toy charges in 2.5 hours with a max current of 0.4A, offering a continuous working time of over 2 hours. An eco-friendly and cost-effective solution, reducing the need for disposable batteries.

Mental and Physical Stimulation for Cats: This toy improves your cat's hunting, swatting, and pouncing abilities, promoting both mental stimulation and physical exercise. Perfect for active indoor cats, it prevents boredom when you’re not home. Results may vary depending on the cat. If your cat doesn’t like the toy, we encourage a return.

name: Migipaws Interactive Automatic Cat Teaser Wand Toy with Strong Suction Cup, 70cm Flexible Wire & DIY Bending Design, Rechargeable Cat Exercise Toy with Auto Timer for Indoor Cats (White)
short_description: Innovative Automatic Cat Wand – Traditional teaser wands are every cat’s favorite, but now your kitty can enjoy interactive play even when you’re not home. This smart automatic cat teaser mimics real owner movements, keeping your cat entertained and active throughout the day.

Ultra-Strong Nano Gel Suction Cup – Equipped with a powerful vacuum + nano gel suction base, the toy firmly attaches to floors, tiles, slightly textured surfaces, or even tempered glass windows. The nano pad is washable with water, so it stays sticky and reusable for long-lasting play.

Extra-Long & Flexible Wire Design – Features a 27.5" (70cm) iron wire for a larger play area and better exercise. The wire can be DIY bent to create unpredictable, dance-like movements that challenge your cat’s hunting instincts and keep the game exciting.

Durable Spring-Loaded Base – Built with a spring connection between the wire and base, so the wand won’t snap even when cats pull hard. This sturdy structure ensures safety, durability, and endless fun for your playful feline.

Rechargeable & Smart Auto Play Mode – Powered by a 600mAh rechargeable battery, lasting up to 2 weeks per charge. The toy runs for 10 minutes every 3 hours, automatically inviting your cat to play and helping build a healthy daily exercise routine without over-stimulation.
Includes 3 accessories: a feathered mouse, a fluttering butterfly and a soft little fish. Even the slightest difference in weight between accessories can alter the hunting experience.

short_description: Inspired by Cat Behavior: Understanding that cats love playing with items hidden under blankets, we designed this interactive toy to mimic that experience. The ball can be placed inside a cloth bag, moving irregularly to captivate your cat’s interest and provide endless entertainment.

Interactive Playtime: This automatic cat toy features random movements that keep your kitty curious and active. Ideal for indoor cats, it prevents boredom and provides essential exercise and enrichment. Perfect for both kittens and adult cats.

Smart Fitness Trainer: Offering a fun hide-and-seek game, this toy encourages your cat to swat and pounce, promoting physical activity and mental stimulation. It’s the best choice for energetic cats needing a daily workout.
Multi-Mode Fun: With three speed modes—fast, slow, and interactive—this electric ball toy adapts to your cat’s play style. Activated by touch, it keeps your pet entertained and stimulated for hours.

Sensory Delight: This interactive toy features chirping sounds, bouncing, providing multi-sensory stimulation that keeps your kitty engaged and playful. It’s the ultimate sensory enrichment tool for your furry friend.
USB Rechargeable Convenience: Easily rechargeable via USB, this cat toy eliminates the need for batteries. It’s eco-friendly and convenient, ensuring uninterrupted playtime for your pet.

Durable and Safe Design: Crafted with high-quality materials, this toy is safe for your cat to play with. The ball and the cloth bag is designed to withstand rough play and is perfect for indoor use, ensuring lasting fun and exercise for your cat.

Versatile Play Options: Suitable for both solo and group play, this toy can engage multiple cats or even small dogs, making it a versatile addition to any pet household. It’s great for self-play and interactive sessions alike.
